//set $0 to $t12 01100
//addu $t0, $0, $0
00000001100011000000000000100001
//addi $t1, $0, 10
00100001100000010000000000001010
//addi $t2, $0, 13
00100001100000100000000000001101
//mul  $t3, $t1, $t1
00000000001000010001100000011000
//j Jump
00001000000000000000000001100100
//bubble:
//addi $t0, $0, 10
00100001100000000000000000001010
//addi $t1, $0, 4
00100001100000010000000000000100
//mul  $t4, $t0, $t1
00000000000000010010000000011000
//outer:
//addi $t6, $0, 8
00100001100001100000000000001000
//subu $t0, $t4, $t6
00000000100001100000000000100011
//addi $t1, $0, 0
00100001100000010000000000000000
//inner:
//lw   $t2, 4($t0)
10001100000000100000000000000100
//lw   $t3, 0($t0)
10001100000000110000000000000000
//subu $at, $t3, $t2
00000000011000101111100000100011
//bgtz $at, no_swap
00011111111000000000000000000011
//sw   $t2, 0($t0)
10101100000000100000000000000000
//sw   $t3, 4($t0)
10101100000000110000000000000100
//addi $t1, $0, 1
00100001100000010000000000000001
//no_swap:
//addi $t5, $0, 4
00100001100001010000000000000100
//subu $t0, $t0, $t5
00000000000001010000000000100011
//slt  $at, $t0, $0
00000000000011001111100000101010
//bgtz $at, next_turn
00011111111000000000000000000001
//j    inner
00001000000000000000000000101100
//next_turn:
//bne  $t1, $0, outer
00010100001000001111111111110000
//j    End
00001000000000000000000001110100
//Jump:
//subu $t2, $t2, $t1
00000000010000010001000000100011
//Loop:
//addu $t4, $t3, $t2
00000000011000100010000000100001
//beq  $t1, $t2, Loop
00010000001000101111111111111110
//j    bubble
00001000000000000000000000010100
//End:
00000000000000000000000000000000
